quote_last: in the morning and Francis Macomber, who had been asleep a little while after he had stopped thinking about the lion, wakened and then slept again.
title: The Short Happy Life of Francis Macomber
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote_first: I’m not going to just lie here, she thought, and let my life be ruined! And when she heard, “God give you good morrow, my masters!
quote_last: and a fair morning!” she flung back the covers and got out of bed, turning to shake Nan.
title: Forever Amber
author: Kathleen Windsor
